name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tapicker - A Web Automation Data Scraper
name.zh_CN: 塔皮克 - 浏览器自动化网页数据采集器

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple no-coding browser RPA tool for easy web scraping, data entry, web automation, data extraction from website to Excel.
short.zh_CN: 简单的无代码浏览器 RPA 工具，可轻松实现网页数据抓取、数据采集、数据输入、网页自动化、从网站提取数据到 Excel。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tapicker is a visual browser automation and web data scraper that makes it easy to build your workflow with just drag and drop, no code required, just like building blocks.

Tapicker is not just a browser extension but also your powerful assistant in work. Its uniqueness lies in the ability to customize workflows, automate tedious tasks, free up your hands, and allow you to focus more time and energy on meaningful tasks.

Tapicker Highlights:

* Intuitive interface - Well-made no-code visual editor
* Customized workflow - Freely combine multiple function blocks to build a powerful workflow
* Automated tasks - Start your workflow with one click and automate complex tasks
* Full process control - Supports loops, conditions, branches, delays, and break controls
* Parallel tasks - Supports multiple windows and multiple tabs to execute tasks in parallel to improve efficiency
* Automated element click - Select an element to automatically click on it during the task
* Automated form submission - Dynamically enter text, select options and submit the form
* Automated paging navigation - Supports various paging navigation to the next page
* Automated infinite scroll - Support infinite scroll pages to load more data
* Subpage navigation - Supports access from home page to subpages
* Randomized access - Supports out-of-order access and random wait to prevent robot detection
* Data deduplication and transformation - Support setting unique indexes and regular expressions
* Data export - Supports exporting data from web pages into xlsx, csv, json, and xml files
* Complex data extraction - Supports data collection from iFrame and Shadow DOM
* Image download - Supports batch downloading images from websites via links
* Browser incognito mode - Works perfectly in the browser's incognito mode
* Free public recipes - You can use and view recipes shared with you for free

Tapicker Use Cases:

* Build test workflow to automate UI testing
* Build social media bots to automate social tasks
* Legacy system data export and customer data entry
* Scrape social media comments for potential business opportunities
* Recruitment website data extraction to build a powerful resume database
* Search engine data collection, extract valuable information through data mining technology
* Scrape data from relevant industry websites to train machine learning and create your own AI assistant
* Scraping data from e-commerce websites to analyze competitors’ product pricing, inventory, sales, etc.
* As an email extractor, collect emails from websites to establish business connections
* More interesting...

Is Tapicker right for me?

Sure! Tapicker provides many functional blocks that you can freely combine to build a powerful automated workflow. For web crawler, only one Extract Data module can crawl data. You can also combine the Scroll Page and Loop blocks to achieve infinite scrolling and automatic next page. This is a process of progressive enhancement.

How to get started?

A good start is to copy. We provide some free recipes that you can view and use directly in the shared recipes, which will allow you to quickly learn about Tapicker.

Can I use Tapicker for free?

Absolutely! Tapicker Free plan is very user-friendly. You can always upgrade to a Plus or Pro plan when you need more advanced features.

Want to learn more?

Check out the release notes: https://www.tapicker.com/release

---

Whether you're an entrepreneur, a freelancer, or an individual passionate about improving work efficiency, Tapicker will be an indispensable tool for you.

Let's explore the infinite possibilities of Tapicker together, making work easier and more efficient!
long.zh_CN:
Tapicker 是一款可视化浏览器自动化和网页数据采集器，只需拖拖拽拽就能轻松地构建你的工作流，无需代码能力，就像搭积木一样简单。

Tapicker 不仅仅是一个浏览器插件，更是你工作中的得力助手，它的独特之处在于你可以自定义工作流程，将繁琐的任务自动化，释放你的双手，让你将更多的时间和精力投入到真正有意义的事情上。

Tapicker 亮点：

* 简单易用的界面 - 制作精良的无代码可视化编辑器
* 高自定义工作流 - 自由组合各个功能块来构建强大工作流
* 自动化任务执行 - 一键启动工作流，自动化执行复杂任务
* 完整的流程控制 - 支持循环、条件、分支、延迟、中断控制
* 多窗口并行任务 - 支持多窗口、多标签并行执行任务来提高效率
* 自动化点击元素 - 只需标记一下元素就能在任务中自动点击
* 自动化表单提交 - 动态输入文字、选择选项并提交表单
* 自动化翻页导航 - 支持处理各种类型的翻页来导航到下一页
* 自动化无限滚动 - 支持无限滚动页面来加载更多数据
* 多级页面的导航 - 支持从一级页面到子页面的访问
* 网页访问随机化 - 支持乱序访问、随机等待来防机器人检测
* 数据去重和清洗 - 支持设置复合索引来去重和完善数据转换清洗
* 多格式数据导出 - 支持导出数据为 xlsx、csv、json、xml 等格式
* 复杂的数据提取 - 支持从 iFrame 和 Shadow DOM 中采集数据
* 批量的图片下载 - 支持通过链接批量的从网站中下载图片
* 浏览器无痕模式 - 可以在浏览器的无横模式下完美运行
* 免费的共享配方 - 可以免费使用和查看共享给你的配方

Tapicker 应用场景：

* 构建测试流程来自动化 UI 测试
* 遗留内部系统数据导出和客户数据录入
* 招聘网站数据提取，构建强大的简历库
* 构建社交媒体机器人来自动执行社交任务
* 抓取社交媒体上评论，寻找潜在的商业机会
* 搜索引擎数据搜集，通过数据挖掘技术提取有价值的信息
* 从相关行业网站采集数据，用于训练机器学习，打造自己的 AI 助手
* 从电子商务网站抓取数据来分析竞争对手的产品定价、库存、销售等
* 作为电子邮件提取器，从网站收集电子邮件以建立业务联系
* 更多好玩的等你发现...

Tapicker 适合我吗？

当然！Tapicker 提供了很多功能模块，你可以自由的组合它们来构建一个强大的自动化工作流。以数据采集器为例，只需一个 Extract Data 模块就能抓取数据，你也可以组合 Scroll Page、Loop 模块实现无限滚动和自动翻页。这是一个渐进增强的过程。

如何快速开始？

好的开始就是临摹。我们提供了一些免费的配方，你可以直接在共享配方里查看和使用它们，这能让你快速掌握 Tapicker。

我可以免费使用 Tapicker 吗？

绝对可以！Tapicker 的 Free 计划非常友好，对于大多数人来说，已经够用了。当你需要更高级的功能时，可以随时升级到 Plus 或 Pro 计划。

我想要了解更多？

请查看发行说明: https://www.tapicker.com/release

---

无论你是一名企业家、一位自由职业者，还是一名热衷于提高工作效率的个人，Tapicker 都将成为你不可或缺的利器。

让我们一起探索 Tapicker 的无限可能性，让工作变得更加轻松、高效！
